import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Play, Users, Trophy, Zap, Shield, Star, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, BarChart3, Globe, Smartphone, Clock } from 'lucide-react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "Interactive Quizzes", description: "Create and take engaging quizzes with multiple question types and real-time feedback." }, { icon: , title: "Social Learning", description: "Share quizzes, follow educators, and learn together in a collaborative environment." }, { icon: , title: "Leaderboards", description: "Compete with others and track your progress with detailed analytics and rankings." }, { icon: , title: "Lightning Fast", description: "Optimized for speed with instant loading and smooth animations for the best experience." }, { icon: , title: "Secure & Private", description: "Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and privacy controls." }, { icon: , title: "Advanced Analytics", description: "Get detailed insights into your performance with comprehensive analytics and reports." } ]; const stats = [ { number: "50K+", label: "Active Users" }, { number: "100K+", label: "Quizzes Created" }, { number: "1M+", label: "Quizzes Taken" }, { number: "4.9/5", label: "User Rating" } ]; const testimonials = [ { name: "Sarah Johnson", role: "High School Teacher", content: "QuizMaster Pro has revolutionized how I create and manage quizzes. The analytics help me understand my students' progress better.", avatar: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=687&q=80" }, { name: "Michael Chen", role: "Corporate Trainer", content: "The premium features are worth every penny. The white-label solution helped us maintain our brand identity perfectly.", avatar: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1170&q=80" }, { name: "Emily Rodriguez", role: "University Student", content: "I love how easy it is to create study quizzes and share them with my study group. The mobile app is fantastic!", avatar: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1170&q=80" } ]; const pricingPlans = [ { name: "Free", price: "$0", period: "forever", description: "Perfect for getting started", features: [ "Create up to 5 quizzes", "Basic analytics", "Community access", "Mobile app access" ], cta: "Get Started", popular: false }, { name: "Premium", price: "$9.99", period: "per month", description: "For serious educators and learners", features: [ "Unlimited quizzes", "Advanced analytics", "Custom branding", "Priority support", "API access", "Bulk import/export" ], cta: "Start Free Trial", popular: true }, { name: "Enterprise", price: "$99", period: "per month", description: "For organizations and institutions", features: [ "Everything in Premium", "White-label solution", "SSO integration", "Advanced security", "Dedicated support", "Custom integrations" ], cta: "Contact Sales", popular: false } ]; return ( <> QuizMaster Pro - Modern Quiz Platform for Education & Training {/* Hero Section */}

Master Learning with Interactive Quizzes

Create engaging quizzes, track progress, and foster collaborative learning with our modern, feature-rich platform designed for educators and learners.

Start Free Trial Explore Quizzes

Sample Quiz: World Geography

What is the capital of Japan?

A) Seoul
B) Tokyo ✓
C) Beijing
